ject: Re: Im Back!

hnosis: Oh, no. What am I going to say to Perplex? What am I going to say t=

Subject: Im Back!


OOC: I just got back from Stratton, Vermont(Awesome sk=
iing trip!).  I just  
read a ton of messages, so forgive me if i get anyth=
ing wrong and correct me.  
 Jason, Tigerhawk is with Airazor heading back =
to the CF.  

:::Wheeljack/Starscream/Bludgeon/Obsidian/The  
Destrocons/Fa=
lcon/Snare/Sideswipe/Time Warp/Atma/Psuedo:::  

::Wheeljack programmed his=
 drones, and actvated the defense mechanism.  The  
drones ran around for a=
while, but they were all eventually taken out by the  
torpedos and homing =
missles.  Wheeljack smiles from ear to ear::  
Wheeljack: SUCCESS!  We shou=
ld report this to Zardus!  
~~~~~  
::Obsidian and Bludgeon hear Drillbit's=
 transmission and head to Hell Beasts  
base. Starscream finds Drillbit::  =

Starscream: Im here Drillbit, buddy.  
::He tunnels with him and reaches H=
ell Beast base.  Bludgeon and Obsidian  
arrive around the same time::  
~~=
~~~  
::My Destrons hear Magmatron and transform to their flight modes and =
head to  
Hell Beasts base::  
~~~~~  
::Sideswipe gets hit by one of Squaw=
kbox's shots, but escapes the other. He  
transforms to robot mode, but by =
the time his guns are ready Squawktalk and  
Beastbox had left::  
~~~~~  
=
::Time Warp is just as ticked as Airbomber::  
Time Warp: Its obvious that =
Infectra isnt here! Lets get out of here before  
we get killed!  
~~~~~  
=
::Atma and Psuedo watch Gramps' death, when they hear Technosis. They run  =

after her::  
Psuedo: Gramps is dead.  
Atma: I think Termitron killed him=
